<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="x_snc_plant_mgmt_tasks"> <x_snc_plant_mgmt_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <activity_due/> <additional_assignee_list/> <approval>not requested</approval> <approval_history/> <approval_set/> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group/> <business_duration/> <business_service/> <calendar_duration/> <close_notes/> <closed_at/> <closed_by/> <cmdb_ci/> <cmdb_ci_business_app/> <comments/> <comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <contact_type/> <contract/> <correlation_display/> <correlation_id/> <delivery_plan/> <delivery_task/> <description>Here are the essentials for watering your *Dancing Lady Orchid*:
1. **Frequency**: Water every 5–7 days in spring/summer, every 10–14 days in fall/winter. 2. **Thorough Soak**: Water until it drains out, then let it dry slightly before watering again. 3. **Humidity**: Aim for 50–60% humidity; use a humidity tray or mist if air is dry. 4. **Avoid Crown**: Keep water off the crown to prevent rot.
This routine should keep your orchid healthy and blooming!</description> <due_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_list/> <impact>3</impact> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <maintenance_task>water</maintenance_task> <number>TASK0026315</number> <opened_at>2024-10-31 16:58:09</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <parent/> <plant display_value="Dancing lady orchid plant">228d3951c3e59210afa6fc84e401319a</plant> <priority>4</priority> <reassignment_count>0</reassignment_count> <rejection_goto/> <route_reason/> <sentiment/> <service_offering/> <short_description>Watering tips for "Dancing Lady Orchid"</short_description> <skills/> <sla_due/> <sn_esign_document/> <sn_esign_esignature_configuration/> <state>1</state> <sys_class_name>x_snc_plant_mgmt_tasks</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-10-31 16:58:50</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>1fe8609ac32dd610afa6fc84e401311d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-10-31 16:58:50</sys_updated_on> <task_effective_number>TASK0026315</task_effective_number> <time_worked/> <u_test_audio/> <universal_request/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_snc_plant_mgmt_tasks> </record_update>
